channel.title: Starting The Client
channel.description:
In my client it says "error downloading cache" but the cache is in the source :/ so why is it saying this in the cmd of the client?
java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/54943850/InstinctCache56 2.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn own Source) at client$1.run(client.java:2298)

item.title: Starting The Client
item.dc:creator: @brynd63 brynd63
item.description:
@brynd63 wrote:

Seems your client is trying to download a cache from dropbox, try uploading the cache in a zip and changing the link to your cache?

Read full topic
